_xResult.title: Wool coat
_xResult.longdesc:
This is a gorgeous wool cashmere womens winter coat that will keep you nice and toasty. It's made of warm wool blend fabric. It has a viscose lining and is filled with Slimtex, a down-alternative insulation. The style itself is timeless and flattering and its available in a wide range of sizes, including plus and petite.
More details:
- Shift silhouette
- Knee-length (midi)
- Funnel Neck (stand collar)
- 70% wool 30% polyester, lining - 100 % viscose, filled with Slimtex (up to -20 C)
- Single-breasted zip fastening
- long sleeves
- two pockets
Color: yellow
For size S: coat length - 39,76" (85 cm), sleeve length 17,72” (61 cm).
Our model wears size S and is 170 cm / 5'6" tall
